name: Friend (3ramet)
description:
FRIEND | Global Game Jam Chiang mai

Story

While you visit your (dead) friend at the cemetery, something strange happens. The world of the living and the dead are connected. In this event, your friends appear to you. Your friend volunteers to get you out of the place. You and your (dead) friend must help each other. The adventure has begun

Control

WASD : move
TAB : switch character
E : Interact the door
